title: 小白，问个简单的问题
body:
1.android assets 目录下面的js文件是来自examples 下面build目录下面的js,每当打开界面的的时候会去服务端下载数据，加载最新的，是这个样的原理是不？
GET /examples/build/component/text-demo.js 200 7ms - 10.31kb
每次打开都会去下载一次examples下面的js,
(如果每次都下载的话这样消耗流量不是相对会大，如果页面逻辑相对复杂的话)

2.我把examples/build下面的js拷贝到android assets报错了(就改了hello.we x显示的内容)：
Error: Cannot find module "!!./../../node_modules/weex-loader/lib/script.js!babel-loader?presets[]=F:\weex-dev\weex-dev\node_modules\weex-loader\node_modules\babel-preset-es2015&presets=F:\weex-dev\weex-dev\node_modules\weex-loader\node_modules\babel-preset-es2015&plugins[]=F:\weex-dev\weex-dev\node_modules\weex-loader\node_modules\babel-plugin-transform-runtime&plugins=F:\weex-dev\weex-dev\node_modules\weex-loader\node_modules\babel-plugin-transform-runtime&comments=false!./../../node_modules/weex-loader/lib/extract.js?index=0&type=scripts!./text-demo.we"
                                                                at webpackMissingModule (eval at <anonymous> ((weex):2997:17), <anonymous>:52:88)
                                                                at Object.eval (eval at <anonymous> ((weex):2997:17), <anonymous>:52:723)
                                                                at **webpack_require** (eval at <anonymous> ((weex):2997:17), <anonymous>:22:30)
                                                                at eval (eval at <anonymous> ((weex):2997:17), <anonymous>:42:18)
                                                                at eval (eval at <anonymous> ((weex):2997:17), <anonymous>:45:10)
                                                                at (weex):3001:8
                                                                at AppInstance.init ((weex)
